/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the image. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their curved roofs and white walls standing out against the blue sky. The buildings are nestled amidst lush greenery, with trees and shrubs adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars are parked along the street, hinting at the life and activity within this serene setting. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, casting soft shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The overall composition of the image suggests a harmonious blend of nature and architecture, a characteristic feature of traditional Chinese urban planning.
